name: Bio-Electric Inc. - Beta Release
description:
To get the full and fastest experience, download for your platform below. However, if necessary, the html format is here!

The Beta is here! After around a month and a half of development, the puzzle/engineering game finally comes to pc! All the instructions are within the game, and you can check out my youtube channel to see the development of the game and updates: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCufsXWKLXrtvH9Rpfi8WM8A?view_as=subscriber
